content.question: Which of the following most directly addressed reservations about the process depicted in the image?

choices.label: The rise of sectional unity in the new republic
The addition of the Bill of Rights to the Constitution
The establishment of the nation’s first political parties
The election of George Washington as the nation’s first president

content.answer: The addition of the Bill of Rights to the Constitution

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
